name: Labourers in food and beverage processing
lead statement: Labourers in this unit group perform material handling, clean-up, packaging and other elemental activities related to food and beverage processing. They are employed in fruit and vegetable processing plants, dairies, flour mills, bakeries, sugar refineries, meat plants, breweries and other food and beverage processing and packaging plants.

main duties: Transport raw materials, finished products and packaging materials throughout plant and warehouse manually, or with powered equipment
Measure and dump ingredients into hoppers of mixing and grinding machines or mobile tank trucks
Feed and unload food, beverage and associated products processing machines
Feed flattened boxes into forming machines to construct containers
Remove filled containers from conveyors and manually pack goods into bags, boxes or other containers
Check products and packaging for basic quality defects
Assist process control and machine operators in performing their duties.
employment requirements: Some secondary school education may be required.
additional information: There is some mobility among occupations in this unit group.
Labourers in food, beverage and associated products processing may progress to machine or process operating positions with experience.

exclusions.name: Labourers in fish and seafood processing (9618)
Process control and machine operators, food and beverage processing (9461)
